entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Carleton-sur-Mer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:09 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
